  • Constructor Details

    • BSTController

      public BSTController(BSTModel model, BSTView view)
      Constructor to initialize the BSTController with the model and view. It sets up necessary listeners and establishes a connection between the view, model, and controller.
      Parameters:
      model - the BST model instance
      view - the BST view instance

      public boolean add(int data)
      Adds a data element to the Binary Search Tree.
      Specified by:
      add in interface BSTControllerInterface
      Parameters:

      Returns:

    • notifyView

      public void notifyView(Node root)
      Notifies the view about changes in the tree structure. Updates the tree panel and traversal results in the UI.
      Specified by:
      notifyView in interface BSTControllerInterface
      Parameters:
      root - the root node of the updated Binary Search Tree
